channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Roku’s stock sinks after streaming company posts another quarterly loss
item.description: Roku Inc.’s stock fell in after-hours trade Wednesday, after the streaming platform posted another quarterly loss and flat average revenue per user.

item.title: Oil Rises Amid Middle East Tensions
item.description: Oil rose in early Asian trade. Prices were significantly affected by recent geopolitical tensions in Israel and Lebanon, says Rania Gule, analyst at X...

item.title: Nikkei Down 0.1%, Dragged by Electronics Stocks
item.description: Japanese stocks were lower, dragged by falls in electronics stocks, amid caution before the Bank of Japan’s policy meeting outcome.

item.title: Coinbase’s stock falls nearly 5% as earnings fall short of estimates
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.’s stock fell in after-hours trading Wednesday, after the cryptocurrency exchange’s third-quarter profit and revenue fell short of...

item.title: Gold Steady; Remains Supported by Haven Demand
item.description: Gold was steady in early Asian trade, after topping $2,800/oz for the first time on Wednesday.

item.title: DoorDash keeps investing in expansion, as more consumers use platform in third quarter
item.description: DoorDash Inc. on Wednesday reported third-quarter results and a fourth-quarter demand outlook that topped expectations, as the company continues to in...

item.title: This retirement expert saved her mom $1,200 on Medicare drugs — and she’s got advice for you, too
item.description: It took many frustrating years for Marcia Mantell to convince her mom to let her help.

item.title: A Financier Penned a Crime Novel. Prosecutors Want to Know How Much Was Fiction.
item.description: Jay Newman, who steered Elliott Management to a $2 billion payday over Argentine debt, also had contact with an alleged hacking mastermind.

item.title: With Reality Labs, Meta risks heading down slippery slope of overspending again
item.description: Zuckerberg said that he is going to keep building out Meta’s infrastructure and data centers, because the opportunity is so huge, even if investors do...

item.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Falls 0.1% to 98.98
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index dropped 0.1%, snapping a three-trading-day winning streak.
